txt.en: 'You found Elf-treasure in the lockboxes? How strange that the Orcs would endeavour to keep it and guard it so jealously.\n\n'I wonder if this particular band of Orcs are on the run from their masters, looting as they escape to survive wherever they land.'
Looting Lockboxes
Collected Elf-treasure (1/6)
'I am sure the Orcs guarding the lockboxes will have keys for the treasure, whatever it is. I am very curious about their hoard!'
Collected Elf-treasure (2/6)
Collected an Elf-treasure (3/6)
Orc-guarded lockboxes can be found in Hîs-urdan in southern Thinglad.\n\nYou should examine the contents of the lockboxes, but first you will likely need to pry keys from the Orcs who hoard them.
Collected an Elf-treasure (4/6)
Orc-guarded lockboxes can be found in Hîs-urdan in southern Thinglad.\n\nYou should examine the contents of the lockboxes, but first you will likely need to pry keys from the Orcs who hoard them.
Collected Elf-treasure (5/6)
Orc-guarded lockboxes can be found in Hîs-urdan in southern Thinglad.\n\nYou should examine the contents of the lockboxes, but first you will likely need to pry keys from the Orcs who hoard them.

Collected a lockbox key
Orc-guarded lockboxes can be found in Hîs-urdan in southern Thinglad.\n\nYou should examine the contents of the lockboxes, but first you will likely need to pry keys from the Orcs who hoard them.

Collected a lockbox key
Renfaer, the scout of southern Thinglad, awaits you at his watch-post.\n\nYou should bring the treasure you gathered to Renfaer.
Unlock Orc lockboxes and collect the treasure within (0/6)

Bring the Elf-treasure to Renfaer
Collected Elf-treasure (6/6)
Collected a lockbox key
Collected a lockbox key
Renfaer has noticed the Orcs of Thinglad greedily hoarding locked chests of loot, and he is curious to see what the enemies hold so dear.

'The Orcs that have settled in the south of Thinglad were spotted carrying strange lockboxes with them. We wish to see what they are hiding and why they are here.\n\n'When you kill Orcs in Thinglad, you should search them for keys. I am curious about what may be so precious to Orcs that they store them away in little locked boxes.'
